title: Network360Â® Custom Reports
body:
**Whether you are building, expanding, or maintaining you networks, Custom Reports focuses your Network360 experience, answering questions specific to your needs such as:**

â€¢ If I enter a new market next plan year, who will my competition be?

â€¢ How are my competitors changing their networks over time?

â€¢ Who are my top competitors based on enrollment/membership?

â€¢ What is my true competitive network ranking when inactive and suspect providers are removed?

Network360 becomes more than just a research tool with access to custom dashboards designed to answer your specific questions. Youâ€™ll have the support of a Zelis analyst who will design dynamic views with an expanded dataset, based on your specific requirements. With Custom Reports, your ability to get the information you need is accelerated, saving you time and money.

<help-video-collection data-id="test-video-collections-in-an-article"></help-video-collection>



We're thrilled to announce the latest update to our Todo App! This release is packed with new features and improvements designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your task management. From a sleek new interface to powerful sorting options, we've listened to your feedback and delivered a suite of updates that will help you tackle your to-do list with ease and efficiency.

* **New Features:**

  * Intuitive drag-and-drop interface for easy task prioritization.
  * Customizable color tags for better organization.
  * Voice command integration for hands-free task creation.
* **Improvements:**

  * Enhanced search functionality to quickly find tasks.
  * Faster sync across devices, ensuring your list is always up-to-date.
  * Improved battery performance for the app.
* **Fixes:**

  * Resolved an issue where notifications were not being sent for some users.
  * Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when adding tasks in offline mode.
  * Addressed various UI inconsistencies across different devices.

Get the update today and experience the best version of our Todo App yet! ðŸš€
